channel.title: 508 source
channel.description: what do you need to work a 508 source

item.title: 508 source
item.dc:creator: @iamthegod iamthegod
item.description:
@iamthegod wrote:

Well for starters, A SOURCE.
Next you need jre and jdk.
Right click the .exe file usually named “run” or “runserver” in the cmd or bin folder.
click edit from the available options if you have edit.
Now you’ll see something like this.

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_??\bin\java.exe” server name/Server 43594

or

“C:\Program Files\Java\jre?\bin\java.exe” server name/Server 43594

change that jdk1.6.0_?? to your version of jdk, I use update 20 so i wud change the ?? to 20, for jre just change it to the correct jre you are using. save and close and run the .exe file, it should work.

have fun

Read full topic
